title: Brioche sausage roll (Saucisson brioche)
description: This is the Rolls Royce of sausage rolls, made with a large French saucisson and a rich brioche dough. It’s usually baked as one large loaf, but individual rolls can be made with smaller sausages. You could also use a roll of sausage meat.
ingredients: 1 large saucisson, or other soft French sausage
1 x 7g/¾oz sachet of fast-action dried yeast
500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
175g/6oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
